content: i have adapted the virus or german shell to include texture for this pattern it is worked in rounds with double_crochet fpdc and bpdc stitches to create added texture to the pattern the pattern explains the first 2 repeats and where to continue to grow your blanket to your desired size approximately 150g of double knit yarn with a 5mm hook will create a blanket approximatly 25 square the pattern also explains how to add remove or change placement of the textured sections so that you can adapt to your preferences find the free written pattern here https //amethystorm co uk/textured-virus-blanket/ if you have any questions please feel free to ask if you create a textured virus blanket please share with me on instagram with #texturedvirus happy hooking
